excerpt: Write a brief 1-2 sentence description of your article that will appear on the home page.
content:
# Your Article Title Here

Your introduction paragraph goes here. Set the scene, introduce the topic.

## First Section Heading

Write your first main point here. Use paragraphs to organize your thoughts.

You can use **bold text** for emphasis and *italic text* for subtle emphasis.

## Second Section Heading

Continue with your next point.

### Subsection (if needed)

Break down complex ideas into smaller parts.

## Conclusion

Wrap up your article with final thoughts.

---

REMEMBER:
- Separate paragraphs with \n\n
- Use # for headings (more # = smaller heading)
- **bold** with double asterisks
- *italic* with single asterisks
- [links](https://example.com) in brackets and parentheses
